details.title: History of monopulse radar in the USSR
details.abstract: Monopulse radars have played an important role in air and missile defense systems since the development of the monopulse technique in the late 1940s. This paper outlines the application of monopulse radars in Russian defense systems, starting with the Moscow ABM system and continuing in instrumentation and air defense radars now widely deployed in Russia and elsewhere
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
